name: Jump Knight (stephendoesnothing)
description:
Jump Knight is a 2D platformer made and developed by stephendoesnothing(me)

The goal of the game is to reach the end, can you make it to the end or will you rage-quit trying?

CONTROLS:

[W] - Move up

[S] - Move down

[A] - Move left

[D] - Move right

[Spacebar] - Jump 

FEATURES(More will come):

5 Levels 

2 Traps

Full-movement

CREDITS: 

The player, spikes, cannon are made all by me.

The castle sprites are from an asset pack :

https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-dungeon-pack

The portal is also from an asset pack :

https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-portal-sprites

I make no money on this game, all rights go to their owners.
